title: Categorize Images
description: Given an image select the category that best describes it.

options.name: Photo of ONE person
options.description: The image is a photo and shows a single person, even if the person is not fully visible.

options.name: Photo of MULTIPLE people or the same person multiple times
options.description: The image is a photo and shows multiple people, or multiple photos of the same person. The people don't have to be fully visible.

options.name: Photo WITHOUT people
options.description: The image is a photo, but no people are clearly visible.

options.name: NOT a photo; e.g., logo or graphics
options.description: The image is not produced with a camera or phone; select this option when the image looks like it was created using a computer or drawn by hand.
